0.name: Mayor Goodman
0.text: Why if it isn't our hero, [Ninten]?

1.name: Mayor Goodman
1.text: Now that the commotion at the zoo is over, the bridge at the [color]northeast[/color] of town is now open.

2.name: Mayor Goodman
2.text: By the way... You have some tiger droppings on your clothes.

3.name: Mayor Goodman
3.text: Haha, just joking. Now run along, kid.
